resources.string: Add new coronavirus infection area. is this good?
Add new coronavirus infection area based on historical data. is this good?
Delete coronavirus infection area. is this good?

Visualize the infected area with a hit map. 
 ■ Display the infection map on the dashboard. 
 Tracking personal movement history information, if corona is infected, the infected person will reflect it on the infection map by self-report. This will help healthy people avoid the area. 
 ■ Notice 
 Healthy people can grasp the degree of risk to some extent by comparing the past movement history information with the infection map. Change your daily behavior to prevent the spread of infection. 
 ■ I think there are problems such as personal information and rumors, but I believe that there is a good way.
